Corey Bojorquez

Corey Bojorquez

Position: P Throws: Right

6-0, 217lb (183cm, 98kg)

Team: Cleveland Browns

Born: September 13, 1996 in Bellflower, CA

College: Cerritos (CA), New Mexico  (College Stats)

Weighted Career AV (100-95-...): 18 (6244th overall since 1960)

High School: Mayfair (CA)

Pronunciation: \boh-HOR-kez\

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Corey Bojorquez?

Corey Bojorquez is 29 years old.

When was Corey Bojorquez born?

Corey Bojorquez was born on September 13, 1996.

Where was Corey Bojorquez born?

Corey Bojorquez was born in Bellflower, CA.

How tall is Corey Bojorquez?

Corey Bojorquez is 6-0 (183 cm) tall.

How much does Corey Bojorquez weigh?

Corey Bojorquez weighs 217 lbs (98 kg).

How many games does Corey Bojorquez play?

Corey Bojorquez played 17 games last season and 124 games over his career.

How many punting yards does Corey Bojorquez have?

Corey Bojorquez had 4,165 punting yards last season and 25,695 punting yards over his career.
